resumeText: SIVANATH BABU V G MERN Stack Developer | Web App Developer | React Enthusiast Madurai, TN | Ph: +91 9994495686 | sivanathbabuvg@gmail.com| LinkedIn | Portfolio | GitHub EDUCATION KLN COLLEGE OF ENGINEERING Sivaganga, TN Master of Computer Application Sep 2023 - Jun 2025 CGPA: 8.8/10 SOURASHTRA COLLEGE Madurai, TN Bachelor of Computer Science Jun 2020 - Apr 2023 CGPA: 8.1/10 WORK EXPERIENCE MIND VISION TECHNOLOGIES Madurai, TN MERN Stack Developer Intern Jan 2025 – Jun 2025 • Spearheaded the development of 5 internal web applications, personally resolving 90% of bugs reported during user testing, and leading to seamless deployment and positive feedback. • Refactored 15+ legacy modules by replacing jQuery monoliths with reusable React components and RESTful Node.js APIs, boosting scalability and cutting code duplication by 40%. • Integrated 5+ RESTful and APIs to link MongoDB with the frontend, streamlining real-time data flow and cutting response times by 25%. UNIVERSITY PROJECTS DIABET
